sentence.Network_en: We went to our grandparent's place for a short visit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们去祖母家呆了一会儿.

sentence.Network_en: A grandparent's job is easier than that of a parent.
sentence.Network_cn: 祖父母的任务比父母的任务要轻松一些.

sentence.Network_en: They are often a grandparent or an aunt or uncle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的监护人通常是祖父母或叔叔阿姨.

entry.def: Your grandparents are the parents of your father or mother.

example.ex: Tammy was raised by her grandparents.
example.tran: 塔米是爷爷奶奶抚养大的。

means.word_mean: 1. a parent of your father or mother

auth_sentence.content: There was always a grandparent in the room wherever you went.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was always a grandparent in the room wherever you went.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was always a grandparent in the room wherever you went.

auth_sentence.content: This person should be of your parent's or grandparent's age.

auth_sentence.content: Being a modern grandparent is totally different to how you imagine it will be.
